Trade/Device Name(s): Sensititre® Haemophilus influenzae/Streptococcus pneumoniae (HP) MIC Susceptibility Plates
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Sensititre HP MIC susceptibility plates for testing Haemophilus influenzae and Streptococcus species with gemifloxacin, linezolid, and levofloxacin.
Indications for Use Summary: Diagnostic device for clinical susceptibility testing of Haemophilus influenzae, Streptococcus pneumoniae, and Streptococcus species with gemifloxacin, linezolid, and levofloxacin; includes clinical significance details for specific species and drugs.
